# Star Wars and History

Kevin S. Decker, et al.
| cover_artist     =
|
| country          = United States
| subject          = Star Wars, World history

| publisher        = John Wiley & Sons
| isbn = 9780470602003
| pub_date         =

Star Wars and History is a book published on November 1, 2012, edited by Janice Liedl and Nancy R. Reagin.
The book, authorized by Lucasfilm, discusses how the epic film series Star Wars borrowed elements from history.
See also
*List of non-fiction Star Wars books
